courses.title: Network Scanning with Zenmap
courses.description: Learn network scanning techniques using Zenmap. This course covers the basics of scanning networks to identify vulnerabilities, port scanning, and interpreting scan results. Duration: 50 mins. Learners: 2316. Available in SB4A since 02 Mar 2023.
